name: Avoid having variable with a too short name (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all the Sections with variable names that are too short. A name is considered short if it has less than 3 characters.
output:
"This report lists all Sections with variable names that are too short.

This QR provides the following information:
Section full name."
rationale: Source code containing short variable names is difficult to read and therefore to maintain.
remediation: Modify the source code to reduce the number of the artifacts with variable names that are too short.
